Role description As a solution architect in our IoT Architecture Team you will be focused on turning our client business challenges into technical solutions. You will bring a mix of technical skills, industry insight, business acumen and leadership. We are looking for experienced hires as well as architects just starting out in their careers who want to progress. We are looking for architect keen to grow and develop their technical skills as well as those who have already spent time acquiring a wide breath of systems experience. You will be joining a dynamic and growing team, advising our clients as they grow their business with innovative technology solutions. Solution Architects shape and define solution architectures for our clients. These architectures are used to transform business requirements into technical solutions, with supporting project plans, detailed designs, and informed technical risk analysis. We work with a client from the earliest stages of a project, from presales, through to delivery and go live. You are the trusted advisor to our clients. As a vital part of our business unit, youll contribute to first-class end-to-end solutions in your assignments. You will play an active role in defining our practices, standards and ways of working, and apply them to your role. Be open to working across organization and team boundaries to ensure we bring the best to our customers. Expectations from the Role Work on some of the most leading-edge cloud-native and hybrid architectures in development today Take end-to-end ownership of shaping solutions & defining the right architectural approach Support project cost estimation and budgeting, planning and delivery as a Technical Leader Collaborate closely with our engineering teams to ensure our solutions are built to reflect your vision and make the best use of current development practices Collaborate with our clients architecture teams and their review boards Maintain t echnical relationships with our technology partners
